metadata.name: Ephemeral
metadata.description:
We are ephemeral.
Always moving.
Changing,
To the beat of the drum.

We try to hold on to the moment.

But time is always fleeting.
Always moving.
Changing,
To the beat of the drum.

A lifetime of transformation.

---

'If today is not your day, then be happy for this day shall never return.
If today is your day, then be happy now for this day shall never return.'
